== Peruvemba (627643) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Peruvemba is a village in the [[Palakkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 2037 hectares and harbouring 4522 households with total population of 19312 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 9471 and female population is 9841. Scheduled Caste Population is 4880 and Scheduled Tribes population is 29. Census Location Code of the village is 627643<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 15113 (78.26%)
* Literate male population: 7889 (83.3%)
* Literate female population: 7224 (73.41%)
